title: Turkey's Ancient Underwater Cities Are A Unique And Enchanting Diving And Snorkeling Destination
description: The lost city of Atlantis may never be found, but in Turkey you'll discover two underwater cities to snorkel and dive in, each with an interesting history.

title: UN climate talks and Canadian policy can't ignore fossil fuels
description: COP30 ended with an astounding contradiction: an agreement to get to net-zero emissions by 2050 without acknowledging the need to wind down use of the fossil fuels.

title: CISLAC Engages Lawmakers on Climate Accountability, Fiscal Reform as Nigeria Confronts Fossil Fuel Dependence

title: Coffs Harbour choir sings Black Smoke in ancient Indigenous language Gumbaynggirr – video
description: On Wednesday nights, people from all walks of life, aged from 12 to 75, meet at a country hall in the Coffs Harbour hinterland to learn songs in Gumbaynggirr. Here is the choir’s rendition of Black Smoke by Emily WurramarraThe Australian school spearheading an Indigenous language revival Continue reading...

title: Fossil Stock Is Quietly Surging—Insiders Just Made Big Bets
description: The dollar has traded heavily in recent days, and it is consolidating in narrow ranges with a slightly firmer bias today.
